name: OrtusHR
overview: Ortus is one of the leading Human Resource Recruitment expert in the UK and a veteran in the field with around 10 years of experience. Dealing with all vertical markets and having worked with a number of esteemed companies, their recruitment policy entails with the complete range of HR discipline including HR change & Transformation, Reward, Compensation and Benefits, Employee Relations, Mobility & Expatriation, HR Business Partners, HR Generalist, HR Systems, Training, Learning & Development, Talent &OD, Recruitment and Resourcing. It caters to the recruitment of HR professionals on interim, contract, and permanent basis. Their proactive and consultative approach along with their expertise, sector specialty, and custom made hiring solutions has enabled it to be a leader in the human resource industry. It has its offices in Dubai, Hong Kong, and Singapore other than its offices in the UK that has its headquarters in London. They aspire to be the recruitment specialist of choice to the HR profession.
